evidence.claim: Merlin AI uses AWS for cloud services and data processing.
The platform complies with HIPAA regulations for handling sensitive health information.
Merlin AI integrates with EHR systems supporting FHIR standards.
The company utilizes Google Cloud Platform (GCP) for scalable data processing.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of engaging in X12 transactions or healthcare clearinghouse activities based on public pages.
